title: Provided that, in case the cost of work is more than the premium to be recovered, such additional cost to be borne by such developer
clause_text: Provided that, in case the cost of work is more than the premium to be recovered, such additional cost to be borne by such developer.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
